name: Please adopt me. # AI needs repair.
storyline:
Use your console system and play 3 games to repair your AI system! 
Find about the secrets of this unknown system with AI, get to know each other, spend time together, and have fun.
summary: The AI system has failed for unknown reasons. AI has lost its memory, and the system seems to have a secret that we don't know. Use your console system and play 3 games to repair your AI system! To repair it with AI, Spend more time with AI, and find the secrets.
